00002 #define FACENET_HPP_

00004 using namespace std;
00005 using namespace ebl;

00007 template<class T>   double calc_image_bias(Idx<T> *img){
00008         Idx<double> bla(img->dim(0), img->dim(1));
00009         idx_copy(*img, bla);
00010         double mymean = idx_sum(bla) / (bla.dim(0) * bla.dim(1));
00011         return mymean;
00012 }
00013 
00014 
00015 template<class T>   double calc_image_dev(Idx<T> *img, double mymean){
00016         Idx<double> bla(img->dim(0), img->dim(1));
00017         idx_copy(*img, bla);
00018         idx_addc(bla, -mymean, bla);
00019         double mydev = sqrt(idx_sumsqr(bla) / (bla.dim(0) * bla.dim(1)));
00020         return mydev;
00021 }
00022 
00023 template<class T> double idx3_mean(Idx<T> *idx){
00024         double mymean = 0;
00025         Idx<double> data(idx->dim(0), idx->dim(1), idx->dim(2));
00026         idx_copy(*idx, data);
00027         for(int layer = 0; layer < data.dim(0); layer++){
00028                 Idx<double> temp = data.select(0, layer);
00029                 mymean += idx_sum(temp) / (data.dim(1) * data.dim(2));
00030         }
00031         mymean = mymean / data.dim(0);
00032         return mymean;
00033 }
00034 
00035 template<class T> double idx3_coef(Idx<T> *data, double mymean){
00036         Idx<double> bla(data->dim(1), data->dim(2));
00037         double mycoef = 0;
00038         for(int layer = 0; layer < data->dim(0); layer++){
00039                 Idx<double> temp = data->select(0, layer);
00040                 idx_addc(temp, -mymean, bla);
00041                 mycoef += sqrt( idx_sumsqr(bla)/ (data->dim(1) * data->dim(2)));
00042         }
00043         mycoef = mycoef / data->dim(0);
00044         return mycoef;
00045 }
